nodes.text: An alien species utilized a design of pyramidal starship during the Galactic Civil War.
The starships were pyramidal in design, and were able to pop into existence via a noiseless fluctuation in the Force.

During the Galactic Civil War, several of the pyramidal ships attacked the Dorion Discus, a freighter captained by Roark Garnet. The ships caused heavy damage to the freighter, which took Garnet three days of hard work to repair. Several days later, more of the ships attacked the Dorion Discus again as Garnet and his Wookiee companion Nagraoao were repairing damage that the ship had taken in a meteor storm.
